src_original: so hi buddhasya dharmmasya saṅghasyāpi hi deśanā ||
tasmāt pañcākārāṇāṃ pratītya samutpannānāṃ pañca tathāgataḥ svabhāvatvāt,
svabhāvasya ca śūnyatākaruṇābhinnatvāt,  śūnyatākarunābhinnaṃ jagaditi sthitam |
taduktam,- rūpakāyau tu paścimau iti | tathā ca -
kṣobhyamudrayaiva jñānaṃ maulaṃ pṛṣṭhamanyat tathā vajrasattvamudrayā vijñānamapi pṛṣṭhaṃ maulaṃ vajramiti syāt |
nanvatra sambedanasiddhau māyopamādvayavādaprasaṅgena sarvvatrāpratiṣṭhānamiti cet -  yat pratītyasamutpannāṃ [notpannaṃ]tat svabhāvataḥ |
tatra catvāro kiṃ jñānamātratāpratipādanāya akṣobhyena mudryante?
avikalpitasaṅkalpa apratiṣṭhitamānasa |  asmṛtyamanasikāra nirālamba namo'stu te ||
etena bāhyā kārabhāve grāhakaśūnyatayā grāhyagrāhakarahitaṃ paramārthasatsambinmātraṃ vijñānameva tiṣṭhate |
yaḥ pratyayādhīna sa śūnya uktaḥ  yaḥ śūnyatāṃ jānati so'pramattaḥ ||
bhrānti vidhūya sarvvā hi nimittaṃ jāyate yahi |
